ygData.subject: -Neo Beast Wars-
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron looked at the fembot bowing before him. It was a pathetic site for such a talented warrior, but she was loyal. Indeed, you have redeemed yourself

Subject: -Neo Beast Wars-

    Megatron looked at the fembot bowing before him. It was a pathetic site 
for such a talented warrior, but she was loyal. "Indeed, you have redeemed 
yourself Kitkat. Such headstrong tactics are just what Im looking for! A 
career as Sub-Commander would do you well, yes."
    He took his tail gun, and instead of hitting her with it, knighted her. 
It was a silly thing to do but the moment felt right.

    Tarantulas watched the two bots walk through the dark beneath him. He 
knew Quickstrike, they had many a good time back in the old war. As for the 
rodent, he didnt know. She must have gotten mixed up his clone. The bastard.
    In his beast mode he slowly dropped, suspended from a cyberweb, and 
dangled in front of them. "Aren't we punctual? Get into the Triangle room at 
the end of the hall. Aracnia needs you two." He said and dropped to the floor.
    He scurried forward, his eight optics shining forward like head beams 
lighting the corridor scattered with the dead aliens.
